TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Batul, title = Batul, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Batul} }

S.FORM: Batul Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsinchu ko Batul a niyaro', 24 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 88 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 83 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 92%, roma 2%.

Batol Itiniay i Jianshi Cen no Hsincho ko Batol a niyaro', 24 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 88 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 83 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 92%, roma 2%.
